title: A compe[n]dius [and] a moche fruytefull treatyse of well liuynge co[n]taynyng the hole su[m]me and effect of al vertue. Wrytten by S. Bernard [and] translated by Thomas Paynell.
author: Bernard, of Clairvaux, Saint, 1090 or 91-1153.
publicationStmtPublisher: In paules churche yearde, at the sygne of the maydens heed, by Thomas Petyt,
